name: Thim's Thrive Fork
description:
Thrive is an ongoing open source project to build a game telling the story of science. https://revolutionarygames.itch.io/thrive

This game is a modified version from one of that project's developers, in order to explore what this game can do. Please comment with your thoughts, but keep in mind that this game will receive far less support than the "real" Thrive.
